remarks: The identity function is a lattice translation.  Remark below Lemma B in [Crawley] p. 112.  (Contributed by NM, 18-May-2012.)
statement:
idltrn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
idltrn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
idltrn.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
idltrn $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( _I |` B ) e. T ) $.
